trans-unit.source: Provides a callback mechanism that can create a <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供回呼機制，可以建立<xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: You can implement a toolbox item creator method with a method signature matching the method signature of this delegate type that creates a toolbox item from any object of a particular clipboard data format placed on the toolbox.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從特定的剪貼簿資料格式，放在工具箱上的任何物件建立工具箱項目，這個委派類型的方法簽章比對的方法簽章與實作工具箱項目建立者方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can design a toolbox item creator that creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> to store text pasted to the toolbox from the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以設計建立工具箱項目建立者<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>儲存文字從剪貼簿貼上至工具箱。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxService.AddCreator%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxService> to add a ToolboxItemCreatorCallback event handler for a particular data type to the toolbox.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxService.AddCreator%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxService>將特定的資料類型的 ToolboxItemCreatorCallback 事件處理常式新增至工具箱。</xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxService> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxService.AddCreator%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `serializedObject` parameter contains the data object.
When you create a ToolboxItemCreatorCallback delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 ToolboxItemCreatorCallback 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。
